reasons: Reasonable grammar and structure; fewer repetitions
output:
We interrupt this regularly scheduled hack
to bring you an important news bulletin.
Jack was one of the true pioneers of house music,
died while house-living in one of his popular nightclubs.
His death is being mourned all over and it's truly a sad day.
Mass hysteria and looting are widespread across the world.
Riots were reported in London
and the United Nations is calling for emergency meeting.
Stay tuned.
